name: Project Fênix
description:
Project Fênix is an experience that I carried out on 10/30/2022, where I challenged myself to give a definite shape to a project that had started months (if not years) ago, when I was trapped in perfectionism and procrastinating to accomplish immense combinations of rules that would make this game epic.

Well, in order to free myself from the curse of perfectionism and the addiction to procrastinating because I have a lot of work to do, I decided to clear my mind, make a checklist of things I knew how to do without difficulty and limited my time to one hour to do so. everything in the game engine and play it.

I am aware that the game is extremely simple, concept not innovative, etc. But I did it because I felt like I needed to feel that I was doing something. I hope you player understand. But who knows, future updates may come to improve the project? Ideas abound. What I lacked was clarity and a sense of accomplishment.

I hope you enjoy the game. Comment so I can evolve the project.
